title: An Evaluation of a Hybrid Approach to Electrolaryngeal Speech Enhancement Based on Noise Reduction and Statistical Excitation Prediction
abstract: An Evaluation of a Hybrid Approach to Electrolaryngeal Speech Enhancement Based on Noise Reduction and Statistical Excitation Prediction Kou TANAKA†, Tomoki TODA†, Graham NEUBIG†, Sakriani SAKTI†, and Satoshi NAKAMURA† † Graduate School of Information Science, Nara Institute of Science and Technology, 8916-5 Takayama-cho, Ikoma-shi, 630-0101, Japan E-mail: †{ko-t,tomoki,neubig,ssakti,s-nakamura}@is.naist.jp
